page.title: 11MY HAMLET_CILIBION
page.content:
CILIBION IS NOT A VILLAGE IT IS A HAMLET,I LIVE IN CILIBION PARK FARM. ON OUR FARM WE HAVE TWO LARGE SHEDS,A SMALL SHED AND A GREENHOUSE.OUR FARM IS MADE UP OF FIFTY ACRES,WE BUY CATTLE THEN FATTEN THEM TO SELL AND WE SELL FARM MACHINERY.IN CILIBION THERE ARE FOURTEEN DIFFERENT BUILDINGS, A SAWMILL,A GARAGE,FOUR FARMS IN USE AND ONE WHICH IS NOT IN USE,FIVE HOUSES AND A DOCTOR BARNARDO'S SUMMER HOLIDAY HOME.CILIBION IS A LARGE PLACE SO THE HOUSES ARE NOT CROWDED TOGETHER.MOST OF CILIBION IS COMMON,FIELDS AND WOODLAND.BROAD POOL IS A LOVELY POOL ON THE COMMON.
DANIEL MORRIS AGE 11 CILIBION.
